citeinfo.title: Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks (FWP) Wildlife Management Areas - Polygons

descript.abstract: Montana's wildlife management areas owned and/or managed by Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks (FWP). Lands managed by FWP do not necessarily imply public access.
descript.purpose: Display and/or analysis of Montana's wildlife management areas.

idinfo.useconst:
Digitized at 1:24,000.
Many of the lands managed by Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks (FWP) are held under conservation easement, lease, or agreement with private land owners and may be managed for the benefit of Montana's wildlife or other natural or cultural resources. Therefore, users of this data should not infer that lands managed by FWP imply public access. For details about public access on FWP's managed lands please contact the appropriate FWP regional office. Regional office contact information can be found at http://fwp.mt.gov/insidefwp/department/hqregions.html.
Users must assume responsibility to determine the usability of this data for their purposes. This data set is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. FWP makes no representations or warranties whatsoever with respect to the accuracy or completeness of this data set and assumes no responsibility for the suitability of this data set for a particular purpose. FWP will not be liable for any damages incurred as a result of errors in this data set.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.1.0.722

attracc.attraccr: Data are continually quality checked by FWP staff and reflect values as of the publication date.

dataqual.complete: Data set is as complete as possible given land transactions are continuous.

citeinfo.title: Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks (FWP) Managed Lands - Polygons

procstep.procdesc: Selected WMAs that are publicly accessible and exported to a separate feature class.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Unique ID associated with the site. SITEID is assigned by the FWP Lands Bureau and can be used to relate to additional site information in the Lands Bureau's tabular database. Note that a site may be comprised of many parcels.

attrvai.attrvae: Double checked by relating to tabular database.

attr.attrdef: First four digits of the site's FILENUM field used by Lands Bureau staff.
FWP administrative region responsible for managment of the site.
Comments or additional information about the site.
Area in acres (calculated by the GIS).
URL for the site on FWP's public website
Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
